alert.note: Alert for Aroostook; Penobscot (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 12 at 6:59PM EDT until July 12 at 7:45PM EDT by NWS Caribou
info.description: The National Weather Service in Caribou Maine has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Aroostook County in northern Maine... North central Penobscot County in east central Maine... * Until 745 PM EDT. * At 658 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Mount Chase to near Millinocket, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Houlton, Millinocket, Patten, East Millinocket, Medway, Hodgdon, Sherman, Island Falls, Smyrna, Amity, Mount Chase, Haynesville, Sherman Station, Cary Plantation, Smyrna Mills, Reed Plantation, southeastern Katahdin Woods and Waters National Monument, Linneus, Oakfield and New Limerick. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
